DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Chronic low platelet count 20,000 < 70,000/µL . Prior liver biopsy indicate chronic hepatitis within previous 5 year radiographic evidence cirrhosis / endoscopic evidence nonbleeding esophageal gastric varix . Exclusion criterion : History heart attack abnormal heart function . History thrombosis within 1 year . History alcohol drug abuse dependence within 1 year . Use aspirin , aspirincontaining compound , salicylate , antacid . History HIV infection active infection Hepatitis B C. Females pregnant . Patients use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug study within 3 week prior start study .
